reason: Bitcoin is experiencing significant downward pressure, breaking key psychological support levels ($71,000 and $70,000) amidst institutional movements (Bhutan selling) and a broader 'AI-driven tech rout.' The comparison to past liquidation events and silver's plunge signals a pervasive risk-off sentiment. The regulatory probe, while not directly BTC-related, adds to a general climate of uncertainty. These factors indicate strong bearish momentum and high volatility, suggesting extreme caution is warranted.
headlines: Bhutan moves bitcoin to trading firms and exchanges as BTC drops to nearly $70,000
House probe targets WLFI after report of $500 Million UAE stake
Silver’s 17% plunge reignites market behaviour that once topped bitcoin liquidations
Bitcoin slips below $71,000 as AI-driven tech rout worsens
